normal.speaker: Lily
normal.line: My power is my responsibility, I will use it for rights.

normal.speaker: Lily
normal.line: My mother taught me to be perfect in all things. I don't intend to fail.

normal.speaker: Lily
normal.line: Hmph. Don't get in my way, I know exactly what I'm doing.

normal.speaker: Lily
normal.line: Magic is a an art, not a blunt weapon. Don't be sloppy.

normal.speaker: Lily
normal.line: Of course I can handle this. Who do you think I am?

taunt.speaker: Lily
taunt.line: The light will guide me to end this darkness.

taunt.speaker: Lily
taunt.line: I fight not for myself, but for the light of this world.

taunt.speaker: Lily
taunt.line: I'll show you the REAL difference in our power. Try to keep up!
